All server side requirements are distributed in the WEB-INF/lib directory:

Apache
	
  * commons-codec-1.4 (http://commons.apache.org/codec/)
  * commons-fileupload-1.2.1 (http://commons.apache.org/fileupload/)
  * commons-io-1.2 (http://commons.apache.org/io/)
  * commons-logging-1.1.1(http://commons.apache.org/logging/)
  * httpclient-4.1.2 (http://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-ga/)
  * httpclient-cache-4.1.2 (http://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-ga/)
  * httpcore-4.1.3 (http://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-core-ga/)
  * httpcore-nio-4.1.3 (http://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-core-ga/httpcore-nio/)
  * httpmime-4.1.2 (http://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-ga/httpmime/)
  * log4j-1.2.9 (http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/)
  * mina-core-1.1.2 (http://mina.apache.org/)
  * poi-3.2 (http://poi.apache.org/)

Page Society / Post Tool (Apache 2)

  * ps_persistence.jar (https://github.com/posttool/PSWebV1.0 )
  * ps_web.jar (https://github.com/posttool/PSPersistenceV1.0)

Oracle

  * db.jar (http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/database/berkeleydb/downloads/oslicense-093458.html)
	
Others

  * closure (Apache2 http://code.google.com/p/closure-compiler/)
  * freemarker.jar (BSD style http://freemarker.org/docs/app_license.html)
  * gson.jar (Apache2 http://code.google.com/p/google-gson/)
  * jdring-2.0.jar (LGPL http://www.jtheory.com/jdring.html)
  * mail.jar (CDDL-1.0, BSD, GPL-2.0, GNU-Classpath http://kenai.com/projects/javamail)
  * uuid-3.2.jar (MIT http://johannburkard.de/software/uuid/)



The following libraries are used on the client side. The are distributed in WebContent/static/js/lib:

  * jquery  (MIT http://jquery.com/)
  * jquery-ui  (MIT http://jqueryui.com/)
  * jquery.animate-enhanced (MIT https://github.com/benbarnett/jQuery-Animate-Enhanced)
  * jquery.cookie (MIT https://github.com/carhartl/jquery-cookie)
  * jquery.editable (MIT http://www.arashkarimzadeh.com/jquery/7-editable-jquery-plugin.html)
  * jquery.field  (MIT http://www.pengoworks.com/workshop/jquery/field/field.plugin.htm)
  * jquery.mousewheel (MIT http://brandonaaron.net/code/mousewheel/docs)
  * jquery.selectbox (MIT http://www.bulgaria-web-developers.com/projects/javascript/selectbox/)
  * jscrollpanel (MIT http://jscrollpane.kelvinluck.com/)
  * markercluster (Apache 2 http://google-maps-utility-library-v3.googlecode.com/svn/tags/markerclusterer/)
  * raphaeljs (MIT http://raphaeljs.com/)
